title: The Liminal Project
tagline: We’re here to build you a unique, stunning, and creative website

about.title: More About Us
about.description: We’re a group of artists and web developers who want to push the limits of the web. We design and build sites that harness modern web technologies to push the limits of web interaction. Is your business or brand looking for a fresh, creative web presence? We’re here to do that for you, from branding and design to development and deployment. Forget about cookie-cutter designs and boring wordpress templates. We do everything from scratch and we do it well.
